scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:babel && npm run build:resources
scripts.db-clean: NODE_ENV=development DEBUG='server, error' npx babel-node src/util/db-clean.js
scripts.db-clean-nodemon: NODE_ENV=development DEBUG='server, error' nodemon --ignore 'deleted/*' --exec babel-node src/util/db-clean.js
scripts.db-tools: NODE_ENV=development DEBUG='server, error' npx babel-node src/util/db-tools.js
scripts.db-tools-nodemon: NODE_ENV=development DEBUG='server, error'  nodemon --ignore 'deleted/*' --exec babel-node src/util/db-tools.js
scripts.start: NODE_ENV=development DEBUG='trace, server, error' nodemon -r dotenv/config --exec babel-node src/index.js
scripts.start:detailed: NODE_ENV=development DEBUG='trace, server, error, details' nodemon -r dotenv/config --exec babel-node src/index.js
scripts.test:act: NODE_ENV=test DEBUG='testing, server, error' node_modules/.bin/mocha --require @babel/register --require @babel/runtime/regenerator --require @babel/polyfill src/mcr/activity/activity.server.spec.js
scripts.test:con: NODE_ENV=test DEBUG='testing, server, error' node_modules/.bin/mocha --require @babel/register --require @babel/runtime/regenerator --require @babel/polyfill src/mcr/consumer/consumer.server.spec.js
scripts.test:ehr: NODE_ENV=test DEBUG='testing, server, error' node_modules/.bin/mocha --require @babel/register --require @babel/runtime/regenerator --require @babel/polyfill src/ehr-definitions/ehr-models.spec.js
scripts.test:ehr:model: NODE_ENV=test DEBUG='testing, server, error' node_modules/.bin/mocha --require @babel/register --require @babel/runtime/regenerator --require @babel/polyfill src/ehr-definitions/EhrDataModel.spec.js
scripts.test:ehr:util: NODE_ENV=test DEBUG='testing, server, error' node_modules/.bin/mocha --require @babel/register --require @babel/runtime/regenerator --require @babel/polyfill src/ehr-definitions/ehr-def-utils.spec.js
scripts.test:lti: NODE_ENV=test DEBUG='testing, server, error' node_modules/.bin/mocha --require @babel/register --require @babel/runtime/regenerator --require @babel/polyfill src/mcr/lti/lti.server.spec.js
scripts.test:one: NODE_ENV=test DEBUG='testing, server, error' node_modules/.bin/mocha --require @babel/register --require @babel/runtime/regenerator --require @babel/polyfill src/mcr/activity/activity.server.spec.js
scripts.test:verbose: NODE_ENV=test DEBUG='server, error' && npm run test
